title: Ep. 193: Caroline Hirons Stops The Nonsense
itunes:title: Ep. 193: Caroline Hirons Stops The Nonsense
itunes:subtitle: Skincare expert Caroline Hirons talks about “clean” beauty, the correct order to apply products, INCI lists, the Environmental Working Group (EWG), and the beauty industry patriarchy. Also in this episode: an innovative bond-repairing...
description:
Skincare expert Caroline Hirons talks about “clean” beauty, the correct order to apply products, INCI lists, the Environmental Working Group (EWG), and the beauty industry patriarchy. Also in this episode: an innovative bond-repairing hair treatment; tips for foot neuromas; new beauty lines from Selena Gomez, Huda Kattan, Carolina Herrera, and Karamo Brown; Gucci Westman’s YouTube show, FDA updates on talc testing; and two beauty gadgets Jenn & Jess actually use.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit
